# 1. Map using `mapview`
```{r}
mapView(points_all, 
        zcol = "point_type", 
        col.regions = c("blue", "red"))
```

# 2. Map using `leaflet`
```{r}
# palette for point colors
pal <- colorFactor(c("yellow", "blue"), domain = c("flag", "board"), ordered = TRUE)

leaflet() %>% 
  # base map
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery) %>%
  # markers: points
  addCircleMarkers(data = points_all,
                   color = ~pal(point_type),
                   popup = paste("Board ID:", points_all$board_id, "<br>",
                                 "Treatment:", points_all$treatment, "<br>",
                                 "Habitat:", points_all$habitat, "<br>",
                                 "Notes:", points_all$notes, "<br>"))
```
